Load and Run the cFE Core and cFE Applications

There are a handful of steps to running the cFE Core and cFE Applications on a given platform:

  • Load the cFE Core Executable on the Target
  • Setup the Target File Systems
  • Transfer the cFE Applications and Startup File to the Target Non-Volatile Disk
  • Description of Fields in the Startup script
  • Start the cFE Core on the Target
